_source.text: 4. Call it the art of a deal: The Jets dealt Derrick Mason to Houston for a conditional late-round pick because New York thought fifth-round pick Jeremy Kerley was playing better than Mason and needed to get on the field, pronto.

text: pick because New York thought fifth-round pick Jeremy Kerley was playing **better** **than** **Mason** and needed to get on the field, pronto.
